qas.question: What declined in the 16th and 17th centuries?
When was the war of Spanish Succession?
What did the war in 1714 mandate as the proper language in documentation?

context: The decline of <a0_0><a4_0>Catalan<a4_0/><a0_0/> continued in the 16th and 17th centuries. The Catalan defeat in the <a1_0>War of <a3_0>Spanish<a3_0/> Succession<a1_0/> (<a2_0>1714<a2_0/>) initiated a series of measures imposing the use of Spanish in legal documentation.
